# Top 10 Holiday Gift Picks For 2023

10.26.2023 | Holiday, 2023, Swag, Beverage, Corporate Gifts

[![Top 10 Holiday Gift Picks For 2023 ](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/pexels-karolina-grabowska-5485987.jpg?width=6720&height=4480&name=pexels-karolina-grabowska-5485987.jpg)](https://www.stran.com/holiday-2023)

The holiday season is upon us, and it's time to start thinking about finding the perfect gifts for your clients and employees! Whether you're shopping for thank-you gifts or appreciation gifts, we've got you covered with our top 10 gift picks for the season. From cozy essentials to outdoor adventures and creative DIY projects, this list has something for everyone.

[![Yeti-2](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Yeti-2.jpg?width=324&height=298&name=Yeti-2.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=18)

[Yeti 30 oz Rambler Tumbler:](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=18) Let's kick off our list with a classic that never goes out of style. The Yeti 30 oz Rambler Tumbler is perfect for keeping your beverages hot or cold for extended periods. It's a must-have for the coffee enthusiast or outdoor adventurer in your life.

[![Pickleball-1](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Pickleball-1.jpg?width=421&height=277&name=Pickleball-1.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=26)

[Pickleball Set](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=26): Pickleball is the latest craze in recreational sports, and it's a game that can be enjoyed by all ages. Gift a pickleball set to your employees or clients, and watch as they fall in love with this fun and social activity.

[![Add a heading-Oct-18-2023-03-12-16-6112-PM](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Add%20a%20heading-Oct-18-2023-03-12-16-6112-PM.png?width=365&height=317&name=Add%20a%20heading-Oct-18-2023-03-12-16-6112-PM.png)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=26)

[Osprey Arcane Day Pack](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=26): For the adventure seekers, the Osprey Arcane Day Pack is a versatile and stylish choice. It's perfect for day hikes or just everyday use. This durable backpack is designed to keep your essentials organized and protected.

[![Waist Pack-3](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Waist%20Pack-3.jpg?width=419&height=253&name=Waist%20Pack-3.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=13)

[Fair Trade Waist Pack](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=13): This holiday season, every belt bag you purchase contributes to providing food for children and families in need.

[![Mini Fireplace-2](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Mini%20Fireplace-2.jpg?width=368&height=303&name=Mini%20Fireplace-2.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=26)

[Personal Fireplace](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=26): There's nothing quite like the warm glow of a crackling fire, and now you can enjoy it in a compact and stylish personal fireplace. Perfect for cozy nights at home, this gift creates a soothing ambiance and makes any space feel more inviting.

[![JBL-2](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/JBL-2.jpg?width=335&height=284&name=JBL-2.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=23)

[JBL Waterproof Speaker](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=23): Music lovers on your list will appreciate the gift of a JBL Waterproof Speaker. It's perfect for beach days, pool parties, or just listening to tunes in the shower. This speaker is both durable and packed with fantastic sound quality.

[![Add a heading-Oct-18-2023-03-15-05-3817-PM](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Add%20a%20heading-Oct-18-2023-03-15-05-3817-PM.png?width=314&height=298&name=Add%20a%20heading-Oct-18-2023-03-15-05-3817-PM.png)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=20)

[Jelly Donut DIY Gift Set](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=20): Get creative with your gift-giving by choosing a DIY kit like the Jelly Donut Gift Set. It's a fun and delicious way to spend time together, and it's perfect for anyone with a sweet tooth and a love for hands-on activities.

[![Cookie-1](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Cookie-1.jpg?width=381&height=263&name=Cookie-1.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=15)

[Sugar Cookie Decorating Set](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=15): Add a dash of sweetness to your holiday season with a sugar cookie decorating set. This gift is great for bakers and those who love to express their creativity in the kitchen. It's an edible art project that's as delicious as it is fun.

[![Cocoa-1](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Cocoa-1.jpg?width=397&height=284&name=Cocoa-1.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=5)

[Dunk It Gift Set](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=5): Hot chocolate lovers, this one's for you! The Dunk It Gift Set is a delightful combination of gourmet hot chocolate, cookies, and a stylish to-go cup. It's perfect for those chilly early morning rituals or for enjoying a relaxing evening by the fire. 

[![Blanket-4](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Blanket-4.jpg?width=368&height=264&name=Blanket-4.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=22)

[Lounge Blanket](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/dcxv/?1692126868/#p=22): Last but not least, everyone needs a cozy lounge blanket for those chilly winter nights. Whether it's for curling up with a good book or watching your favorite movies, this gift provides warmth and comfort in style.

Selecting the perfect holiday gifts for your employees and clients in 2023 involves consideration of their individual interests and preferences. Personalized and thoughtful gifts will make a lasting impression and foster positive relationships. This holiday season, we encourage you to think beyond the ordinary and embrace the opportunity to surprise your employees and clients with unique, and memorable gifts. [Let us help you with your gift-giving this holiday season](/holiday-2023)

### Let's Stay in Touch!

# Top 10 Gift Picks for 2024

11.19.2024 | Featured Homepage, Holiday, Swag, 2024, Corporate Gifts, Seasonal

Corporate gifting is more than just a seasonal tradition; it‚Äôs a strategic way to strengthen professional relationships and foster loyalty. But really, who has time to shop around for the perfect gift for everyone in your network? We know that planning a corporate gifting program can be overwhelming‚Äîespecially when you want each gift to be meaningful. To make your life a little less stressful this holiday season, we've handpicked a list of gifts that are sure to impress.Our curated selection of trending gifts promises to impress and delight. Whether you aim to surprise a tech-savvy client or indulge a culinary enthusiast on your team, these gifts are designed to cater to diverse tastes and preferences.

### Our Top 10 Gifts for Holiday Success

With the holiday season fast approaching, ensuring that your corporate gifts stand out is essential. Our curated selection of trending gifts promises to impress and delight. Whether you aim to surprise a tech-savvy client or indulge a culinary enthusiast on your team, these gifts are designed to cater to diverse tastes and preferences.

‚≠êÔ∏è [See the perfect gift for your program? Find pricing info and order minimums here! ](/top-holiday-gift-picks)

1 - Polaroid Go Gen 2 Everything Box: Capturing Memories

[![Top 10 Gift Picks-05](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-05.jpg?width=485&height=485&name=Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-05.jpg)](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-polaroid)

[ Shop the Polaroid Go ](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-polaroid)

This compact camera is perfect for capturing life's moments on the go, featuring a selfie mirror, self-timer, and double exposure capabilities. The Polaroid Go Gen 2 Everything Box offers a unique blend of nostalgia and modern technology. Its ultra-portable design makes it the smallest instant camera in the world, yet it doesn't compromise on quality or creativity. 

Equipped with a wider aperture range, precise light sensor, and optimized exposure settings, this camera is perfect for anyone looking to explore their creative side. The included double pack of classic Polaroid film ensures recipients can start capturing memories right away, making it a delightful and thoughtful gift.

2 - Fellow Carter 3-in-1 Sip System: Versatile and Stylish[![Top 10 Gift Picks-06](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-06.jpg?width=502&height=502&name=Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-06.jpg)](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-fellow-sip-system)

[ Shop the Fellow 3-in-1 System ](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-fellow-sip-system)

When it comes to versatility and style, the Fellow Carter 3-in-1 Sip System stands out as a remarkable gift. This versatile mug adapts to any beverage need with its three interchangeable lids, making it a practical yet stylish gift for anyone who enjoys their drinks on the move. Its sleek design and functionality make it a popular choice for frequent travelers and commuting professionals.The Classic Move Lid keeps beverages hot or cold for extended periods, while the Slide Lid allows for quick sips on the go. The Cold Lid, complete with a spill-resistant Tritan straw, is perfect for those who prefer their drinks chilled. Each component of the mug is elegantly designed, making it not just a practical choice but a stylish accessory for any recipient.

3 - Brownie Points Gift Set: A Sweet Gesture[![Top 10 Gift Picks-07](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-07.jpg?width=526&height=526&name=Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-07.jpg)](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-brownie-points)

[ Shop the Brownie Points Gift Set ](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-brownie-points)

For those who appreciate the sweeter things in life, the Brownie Points Gift Set is an irresistible choice. This DIY baking kit includes a Stonewall Kitchen Triple Fudge Brownie Mix and a set of La Cuisine baking essentials. It's a gift that encourages creativity and indulgence, perfect for baking enthusiasts or anyone who enjoys a hands-on experience in the kitchen.Packaged in a stylish tote, this set is both practical and engaging, offering recipients the chance to create delicious treats while feeling appreciated. The inclusion of an all-purpose apron, baking tools, and oven mitts ensures that this gift is not only thoughtful but also functional.

**4 - Hush Hand Knitted Weighted Blanket: Cozy & Calming**

[**![Top 10 Gift Picks-08](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-08.jpg?width=491&height=491&name=Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-08.jpg)**](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-hush-weighted-blanket)

[ Shop the Hush Weighted Blanket ](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-hush-weighted-blanket)

Perfect for chilly nights and cozying up, the Hush Hand Knitted Weighted Blanket is a luxurious addition to any space. This 15-pound blanket offers a calming, stress-relieving experience that‚Äôs ideal for unwinding after a long day. Weighted blankets are known for their soothing effects, and this hand-knitted version adds an extra touch of elegance and comfort.

Its neutral color and premium design make it a versatile gift that can elevate any room. For clients or employees who deserve a little extra relaxation, this blanket provides both comfort and style.

**5 - 11 Piece Acacia Wood Cheese Set: Elegant Entertaining**

[**![Top 10 Gift Picks-09](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-09.jpg?width=504&height=504&name=Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-09.jpg)**](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-wood-cheese-set)

[ Shop the Acacia Wood Cheese Set ](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-wood-cheese-set)

Ideal for entertaining enthusiasts, the Acacia Wood Cheese Set is a classy, functional gift that enhances any gathering. Featuring a high-quality acacia wood serving board and an 11-piece set of cheese knives and utensils, this gift brings sophistication to holiday entertaining.

The set‚Äôs elegant design and practical components make it an impressive gift for clients or team members who enjoy hosting. It‚Äôs a thoughtful gesture that adds a touch of refinement to any table spread.

**6 - Osprey Transporter Duffel: Reliable and Durable**

[**![Top 10 Gift Picks-10](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-10.jpg?width=521&height=521&name=Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-10.jpg)**](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-osprey-duffel)

[ Shop the Osprey Transporter Duffel ](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-osprey-duffel)

For those on the go, the Osprey Transporter Duffel combines rugged durability with modern functionality. Made with weather-resistant materials, it‚Äôs built to withstand any adventure, from business trips to weekend getaways. The duffel‚Äôs spacious interior and comfortable shoulder strap make it both practical and stylish.

This gift is perfect for anyone who travels often or enjoys outdoor activities, providing a reliable bag that‚Äôs ready for whatever the journey brings.

**7 - Retro Wireless Bluetooth Speaker: Music on the Move**

[**![Top 10 Gift Picks-11](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-11.jpg?width=527&height=527&name=Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-11.jpg)**](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-retro-wireless-speaker)

[ Shop the Retro Wireless Bluetooth Speaker ](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-retro-wireless-speaker)

A nostalgic touch meets modern tech with this Retro Wireless Bluetooth Speaker. Its compact, portable design allows users to enjoy high-quality sound wherever they go, making it a thoughtful gift for music lovers or those who appreciate vintage aesthetics.

This speaker blends style with functionality, offering up to 10 hours of playback time on a single charge. It‚Äôs a perfect choice for clients or employees who love to bring their tunes along, whether at home or on the go.

**8 - Cast Iron Skillet Baking Set: For Culinary Creatives**

[**![Top 10 Gift Picks-12](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-12.jpg?width=491&height=491&name=Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-12.jpg)**](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-cast-iron-baking-set)

[ Shop the Cast Iron Skillet Baking Set ](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-cast-iron-baking-set)

Bring a touch of rustic charm to the kitchen with the Cast Iron Skillet Baking Set. This gift includes a pre-seasoned cast iron skillet and a variety of baking mixes, allowing recipients to create homemade dishes with ease.

Perfect for culinary creatives, the set offers versatility and durability, whether baking, saut√©ing, or roasting. It‚Äôs a gift that will inspire cooking enthusiasts and provide a unique way to show appreciation.

**9 - 16 Oz. Ceramic Candle: Elegant Ambiance**

[![Top 10 Gift Picks-13](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-13.jpg?width=562&height=562&name=Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-13.jpg)](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-ceramic-candle)

[ Shop Ceramic Candles ](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-ceramic-candle)

Crafted with a minimalist design, the 16 Oz. Ceramic Candle is a sophisticated gift that brings ambiance and relaxation to any setting. With its long burn time and subtle fragrance, this candle is perfect for creating a calming atmosphere, whether at home or in the office.

This candle‚Äôs elegant ceramic holder makes it a stylish accessory that can be reused, ensuring the gift has a lasting impact. Ideal for clients or team members who appreciate a touch of tranquility, it‚Äôs a thoughtful way to express gratitude.

**10 - Custom Crew Socks: Personal and Practical**

[![Top 10 Gift Picks-14](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-14.jpg?width=599&height=599&name=Top%2010%20Gift%20Picks-14.jpg)](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-custom-crew-socks)

[ Shop Custom Crew Socks ](https://www.stran.com/top-holiday-gift-picks-custom-crew-socks)

For a gift that‚Äôs both personal and practical, Custom Crew Socks offer comfort and style. These socks can be customized to reflect your brand‚Äôs personality, making them a memorable keepsake that recipients can enjoy year-round.

With high-quality materials and a comfortable fit, custom socks add a fun, unique touch to any holiday gifting program. They‚Äôre perfect for clients, employees, or partners who appreciate attention to detail and a sense of individuality.

### Let Our Experts Take the stress out of holiday gifting 

Corporate gifting doesn‚Äôt have to be complicated. From selecting standout gifts to handling delivery details, we take care of everything, so you can focus on what really matters: building lasting connections.At Stran, we‚Äôre committed to quality and reliability, curating gifts that reflect your brand values and resonate with your recipients. We know the importance of making a positive impression, and our customized gifting solutions are crafted to do just that. Let us handle the logistics and elevate your holiday gifting program so you can get back to finishing the year hitting goals and releasing holiday stress!

# How Corporate Gifting Programs Maximize Your Marketing ROI

10.11.2024 | Featured Homepage, Holiday, Custom Store, Swag, Marketing, 2024, Corporate Gifts

The holiday season is nearly upon us, and this time of year isn‚Äôt just for celebration‚Äîit‚Äôs the perfect time to connect with the people who help shape your business. And one of the best ways to do that? Sending thoughtful, personalized gifts to your professional network.

Corporate gifting might seem like a small gesture, but it makes a big impact in terms of building lasting relationships with your clients and employees. Let‚Äôs dive into why sending gifts during the holidays is more than just a nice-to-do; it‚Äôs a smart strategy that can drive business opportunities in the new year and beyond. 

![Corporate Gifting 2 copy](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Corporate%20Gifting%202%20copy.png?width=511&height=304&name=Corporate%20Gifting%202%20copy.png)

## Why Appreciation Gifts Matter

When we talk about ‚Äúmaking lasting connections‚Äù, what it really comes down to is helping your network feel valued. And what better way to show someone in your network that they matter than with a customized, high-quality gift just for them? Corporate gifts can do so much more than simply saying thank you; they‚Äôre a way of strengthening the bonds that help drive your business forward.

A gift says, ‚ÄúI see you, and I value what you bring to the table.‚Äù It helps foster trust, loyalty, and stronger relationships, whether that‚Äôs with a long-term client or an employee who‚Äôs been grinding away all year.

If valuing your network doesn‚Äôt quite convince you that corporate gifting is worth it, check out these proven impacts that sharing branded gifts can have on your business. 

#1 - Strengthen Relationships With Clients and Employees

A recent industry study showed that a whopping 80% of corporate gift buyers say that gifting helped improve their relationships with clients and employees. Surprised? It‚Äôs an impressive stat, but the reason is simple: corporate gifts make people feel seen, valued, and appreciated.

Gifts with a little creativity and personal touch can also deliver a memorable experience to recipients. This approach taps into the idea of ‚Äúsurprise and delight‚Äù, and shows that you value your relationship beyond business transactions.

Pro tip: [Choose gifts](/holiday-merch) that align with the recipient‚Äôs interests or reflect your shared values to really drive home your connection. 

2. Improve Customer Loyalty

If you want to keep your customers coming back, consider sending them a holiday gift. Roughly  70% of businesses believe that gifting enhances brand loyalty. 

And that makes sense, right? A thoughtful holiday gift lets your customers know they‚Äôre more than just a number; it shows that you appreciate their business, and builds an even more positive association with your brand.

Bonus: Your branded gifts serve as regular reminders of your company. When a customer uses their branded gift (for example, a [cozy new fleece](/promotional-products/apparel) or [sleek tumbler](/promotional-products/drinkware)), they‚Äôre more likely to think of your brand when it‚Äôs time to make a purchase again.

3. Boost Employee Retention and Productivity

Everyone wants to feel appreciated, and your employees are no different. In fact, 75% of employees say they feel more valued and motivated when they receive gifts from their employer. And during the holidays, a small gesture can really lift spirits.

Gifting your team members something special shows you see their hard work and dedication, and that you value them beyond their workplace responsibilities. 

And in return? Happier employees do better work. So take time to share gifts that your team will use again and again to help your employees feel recognized and part of the bigger picture.

4. Generate New Leads and Nurture Relationships

Here‚Äôs where gifting really starts to have a measurable ROI: a well-chosen gift can increase the likelihood of a prospect taking a favorable action by 2.3 times. That‚Äôs right‚Äîa thoughtful gift can help turn a lead into a customer or reignite a connection with someone you haven‚Äôt heard from in a while.

Think of holiday gifting as an icebreaker or a relationship-building tool. It gives you an excuse to reach out in a way that feels warm and personal, rather than just a business transaction. 

5. Increase Brand Awareness

Branded gifts aren‚Äôt just appreciated‚Äîthey're cherished over time. As many as 87% of recipients keep corporate gifts for over a year, meaning your brand stays in front of them for a long time. A useful or unique branded item becomes a part of their daily lives, subtly keeping your company top of mind.

Whether it‚Äôs branded drinkware or a [tech accessory](/promotional-products/technology), these items carry your brand into the recipient‚Äôs workspace or home, continuously promoting your business in an organic way. This brand visibility is invaluable, particularly during the holiday season when competition for attention is high.

How to Build an Effective Corporate Gifting Program![FathersDay_GiftGuide_Hero_1688x1350](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/FathersDay_GiftGuide_Hero_1688x1350.png?width=482&height=385&name=FathersDay_GiftGuide_Hero_1688x1350.png)

If you‚Äôre thinking of incorporating corporate gifting into your holiday strategy, consider the following best practices:

Personalization is key: Tailor your gifts to the recipient's interests or your shared business goals. [Customization](/promotional-products) adds a thoughtful touch that makes your gift stand out.

Think practical yet unique: While you want your gift to be useful, adding a creative element helps make it memorable. Branded tech accessories, stylish drinkware, or [premium apparel](/fall-winter-apparel) are great options.

Focus on quality: Low-quality gifts can reflect poorly on your brand. Choose items that convey the same high standards you apply to your business.

To ensure your corporate gifting program is a success, consider partnering with an expert who can help you navigate options, customization, and fulfillment. Our [corporate gifting services](https://www.stran.com/services/corporate-gifts) at Stran are designed to help you make a lasting impression with thoughtfully curated, high-quality gifts that align with your brand and your recipients‚Äô preferences.

Make an Impact this Holiday Season

This holiday season, leverage the power of corporate gifting to strengthen relationships, enhance loyalty, and increase brand awareness. A thoughtful, well-executed gifting program can leave a lasting impression on your clients, employees, and business partners.

Ready to take your corporate gifting strategy to the next level? [Reach out to our team](/contact) today to start building a custom holiday gifting plan tailored to your business needs.

# How Companies Celebrate Pride 2024

06.07.2024 | Events, Swag, Pride, 2024, Seasonal, Nonprofit

![Screenshot 2024-06-06 163327](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-06-06%20163327.png?width=888&height=586&name=Screenshot%202024-06-06%20163327.png)

Pride Month celebrates the LGBTQ+ community's history, contributions, and ongoing fight for equality. While June brings vibrant parades and events, the spirit of Pride calls for year-round commitment. Celebrations are exciting, but true allyship comes from putting diversity and inclusion at the forefront every day. In this article we‚Äôll highlight how Chipotle, Coca-Cola, and Converse celebrate Pride and work to build equality in the workplace. Take a look for some inspiration on creative and meaningful ways to support your LGBTQ+ team members this year.

## What is Pride and Why It Matters

Originating from the 1969 Stonewall Riots, Pride month reminds us of the progress towards equal rights for the LGBTQ+ community and the work that still lies ahead. It's a time to celebrate, reflect, and advocate for a world where everyone is accepted for who they are. The significance of Pride goes beyond parades and rainbow flags; it's about recognizing and uplifting the voices of those who have been marginalized and continuing the push for equal rights. 

## Companies WITH Pride in their DNA 

## Chipotle

Chipotle's ["Love What Makes You Real"](https://newsroom.chipotle.com/2024-05-29-CHIPOTLES-LOVE-WHAT-MAKES-YOU-REAL-CAMPAIGN-RETURNS-FOR-PRIDE-MONTH-AND-BEYOND) campaign returns for Pride Month 2024, celebrating authenticity with limited-edition Pride uniforms and merchandise. Employees can participate by requesting a Pride-themed uniform shirt. Sales from [Chipotle‚Äôs Pride Edit](https://chipotlegoods.com/) merchandise collection benefit [The Trevor Project](https://www.thetrevorproject.org/), and customers can join in the effort by rounding up their orders to help the same charity. Chipotle also builds representation and cultivates community impact by participating in Pride parades in Orange County, California, and Columbus, Ohio. 

## Coca-Cola

Coca-Cola has a rich history of supporting the LGBTQ+ community through various initiatives and partnerships. In past years, Coca-Cola has launched [digital collectibles](https://www.coca-colacompany.com/media-center/pride-inspired-digital-collectibles-benefiting-lgbtqia-charities) to celebrate Pride, with proceeds supporting LGBTQIA+ charities. For Pride Month 2024, Coca-Cola continues to showcase its support with a variety of Pride-branded merchandise. This year, their [collection ](https://www.coca-colastore.com/collections/pride)features vibrant items including custom t-shirts, branded water bottles, special edition bags with a Pride version of their logo, and more. By offering these bespoke items, Coca-Cola empowers its customers to celebrate Pride and represent their favorite brand while supporting the LGBTQ+ community. This is a fantastic example of how large brands can make a positive impact through marketing. 

## Converse

[Converse ](https://about.nike.com/en/newsroom/releases/converse-10th-annual-lgbtqia-pride-campaign)is celebrating its 10th annual LGBTQIA+ Pride campaign 4 with a focus on storytelling and community support. For Pride 2024 the Boston-based lifestyle brand introduced a new collection featuring designs by LGBTQIA+ artists. The proceeds of these exclusive designs will benefit organizations including the [It Gets Better Project](https://itgetsbetter.org/) and the [Ali Forney Center](https://www.aliforneycenter.org/). Converse encourages employees to participate in local Pride events and offers educational resources to foster an inclusive workplace. The brand also highlights personal stories from LGBTQIA+ community members to amplify diverse voices and experiences.

###### üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà [Looking For More Brand Inspiration For Pride? Check out Our Pride Lookbook!](/pride-2024)

## Promoting Equality and Allyship in the Workplace

## What Companies Can Do

Building an inclusive workplace requires continuous effort. Here are five impactful jumping-off points that companies can enact to improve inclusivity, promote equality, and amplify marginalized voices: Diversity and Inclusion Training: Regular workshops help employees appreciate diverse perspectives and build a more inclusive culture. Employee Resource Groups (ERGs): ERGs for LGBTQ+ employees create a supportive community within the workplace. Comprehensive Benefits: Offer benefits that cover same-sex partners and support LGBTQ+ health needs, like gender-affirming surgery or therapy. Anti-Discrimination Policies: Enforce clear policies to protect against discrimination based on sexual orientation and gender identity. Support for LGBTQ+ Events: To show genuine support, Sponsor Pride events, create custom merch, and support local LGBTQ+ causes.

## How Employees Can Demonstrate Equality and Allyship

Employees can make a big difference in creating an inclusive workplace. Here are five practical ways to show equality and allyship: Ask for Pronouns: Respectfully ask colleagues for their pronouns and use them. MyPronouns.org is a great resource. Use Inclusive Language: Use terms like "partner" or "spouse" instead of "husband" or "wife" to include everyone. Learn Continuously: Educate yourself on LGBTQ+ issues through resources like GLAAD and The Trevor Project. Create (or Be!) a Safe Space: Offer support by listening and amplifying the voices of your LGBTQ+ colleagues and by advocating for inclusive policies. Join Events: Participate in Pride and other LGBTQ+ events to show your support. 

# What Do Companies Do for Pride Month?

1 - Organize Pride Events Companies can host or participate in local Pride parades, workshops, and seminars. These events create visibility, show public support for the LGBTQ+ community, and promote a sense of inclusivity and engagement among employees and customers. For example, check out Boston Pride for event ideas.

2 - Develop Authentic and Inclusive Marketing Campaigns Pride isn't about rainbow-washing your brand's feed‚Äîthat's just hopping on the marketing bandwagon. Instead, use Pride Month as a jumping-off point for making your content more inclusive year-round. Consider bringing in guest posters from the LGBTQ+ community to raise awareness or showcasing LGBTQ+ stories and achievements to promote genuine representation.

3 - Support Charities Support charities by donating or partnering with LGBTQ+ organizations like the Human Rights Campaign, The Trevor Project, and GLAAD. This financial support helps these organizations continue their vital work and reflects your company's dedication to social responsibility. Want more ways to support charities? Check out #4 on our list. It might inspire you to create limited-edition promotional items that support the LGBTQ+ community and help raise money for these important organizations.

4 - Create Custom Promotional Products When your brand stands for something, you want to shout it to the word‚Äîand custom promotional products help you do just that! One way to support Pride is by creating and selling Pride-themed products that match your brand's values and support your broader inclusivity goals. Popular options for branded merchandise include custom t-shirts, bags, and drinkware. These items can be used at events or sold, with proceeds supporting LGBTQ+ causes. Efforts like these demonstrate allyship and commitment to the LGBTQ+ community, help raise awareness, and promote inclusivity within your customer base. Plus, custom merch is a great and really fun way to show support for Pride in June and beyond!

5 - Provide Employee Education Offer training sessions and resources on LGBTQ+ issues and allyship. Education fosters a more inclusive workplace by increasing awareness and understanding among employees, which is essential for creating a supportive and welcoming environment for everyone. 

## Looking Ahead

Pride is a movement, not a month. Companies committed to a diverse and inclusive workforce must model these expectations and behaviors for their teams. Household brands like Chipotle, Coca-Cola, and Converse may have large-scale, public Pride initiatives, but brands of every size can draw inspiration from these Pride campaigns and create their own ways to champion inclusivity, allyship, and equality. Don‚Äôt be afraid to get creative in cultivating a workplace where everyone feels valued and respected daily.

# Upcoming Product Trends To Watch Out For In 2024

12.20.2023 | Featured Homepage, trends, Swag, 2024, Beverage, Corporate Gifts

Can you believe we're on the brink of 2024? Time sure does fly, and so do trends in the world of promotional products. It's like a fast-paced game of catch-up for brands, and we're here to spill the tea on the hottest trends you need to know for your 2024 marketing plans. Ready for a sneak peek?

Let's talk tech! 

In today's digital jungle, businesses are all about engaging their audience. Picture this: Flash buys and online pop-up shops are the cool kids on the block. They're like limited-time sales that bring the hype, making people feel like they're part of an exclusive club. Brands use them to test the waters, clear out inventory, or simply say, "Hey, we appreciate you!" Think email, social media, or text alerts ‚Äì whatever floats your boat.

![E-commerce webstore merch](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Add%20a%20heading-Dec-15-2023-10-09-37-9830-PM.png?width=581&height=379&name=Add%20a%20heading-Dec-15-2023-10-09-37-9830-PM.png)

And oh, the allure of retail brands! 

Imagine adding a touch of magic to your branded merchandise by teaming up with well-known brands. It's like sprinkling fairy dust on your products, instantly boosting their value and making your brand stand out. Plus, you get to tap into the fanbase of those popular brands ‚Äì talk about a win-win!

![snowboarding skiing merch 2024 ](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/132786130_10158495662258124_3197972670317026490_n.jpg?width=489&height=489&name=132786130_10158495662258124_3197972670317026490_n.jpg)

Now, let's get personal. 

Full customization is the name of the game. In this crazy competitive world, standing out is not just important; it's everything. So, why not go all in? Yes, fully personalized products take more time and effort, but the creative freedom they offer is unmatched. Tailor each detail to reflect your brand's personality ‚Äì it's like creating a masterpiece that's uniquely yours.

![lL bean tote bag dupe Embroidery 2024](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/4584.png?width=467&height=602&name=4584.png)

Feeling a bit nostalgic lately? 

Us too! Turns out, bringing back elements from the past in promotional products is all the rage. Retro designs, throwback logos, and vintage packaging ‚Äì they're not just cool; they tap into people's emotions. It's like taking a trip down memory lane, creating a bond between your brand and your audience. So, embrace the throwback vibes and make your brand unforgettable.

![90s fashion merch 2024 ](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/armen-aydinyan-xj_HFnpjg0w-unsplash.jpg?width=542&height=359&name=armen-aydinyan-xj_HFnpjg0w-unsplash.jpg)

And then there's the green revolution. 

Going eco-friendly is not just a trend; it's a movement toward sustainability. People are all about it, and businesses are catching on. Imagine having branded merchandise made from recycled or biodegradable materials ‚Äì it's like telling the world, "Hey, we care about the planet, and we know you do too!" There's many ways to look at the sustainability of a product from where its manufactured to whether it replaces single use items or comes in reduced packaging. Pairing actual sustainable products with design elements that convey a sense of eco-ness such as natural color pallets and simple design concepts can help to really align your brand with a cause that we all should care about.

![sustainable merch 2024](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/md-salman-tWOz2_EK5EQ-unsplash.jpg?width=482&height=857&name=md-salman-tWOz2_EK5EQ-unsplash.jpg)

2024 and Beyond.

So, as we step into 2024, the promotional products world is buzzing with excitement. From embracing tech to getting cozy with nostalgia and going green, there's a trend for every taste. Packaging and presentation are like the icing on the cake, adding that extra oomph. The question is, how will your brand ride these waves to make a lasting impact? Let's make 2024 the year your brand shines brighter than ever! Cheers to finding your groove! [Contact us today!](/contact)

# Merch for Good: Leverage Branded Swag to Support Important Causes

11.11.2024 | Featured Homepage, giving back, Holiday, Volunteering, Swag, 2024, Beverage, Corporate Gifts

Breast Cancer Awareness Month might be over, but supporting the movement doesn‚Äôt have to end. The season of giving is just beginning, as the final quarter of the year has become a time for companies to refocus on giving back‚Äîwhether that‚Äôs through donations, team volunteer events, or putting remaining budgets to good use in support of charitable causes.

For companies looking to make a meaningful impact, branded merchandise provides a unique opportunity to support causes that matter to them and their communities. Here‚Äôs how your organization can leverage merchandise to make a difference this season.

### **Choosing Cause-Driven Brands in Corporate Gifting Programs**

Corporate holiday gifts are an ideal way to give back while showing appreciation for employees, clients, and partners. By selecting mission-driven merchandise, you can make a positive impact through products that come with charitable giving built in.

**Top Pick for Impact: Backpacks for the American Cancer Society**

These bags are a practical option for branded merch, and a portion of each purchase goes directly to the American Cancer Society. If you‚Äôre looking to continue Breast Cancer Awareness initiatives through the rest of the year, we can‚Äôt think of a better product than this bag.

**![WHAT DO AWARDS LOOK LIKE](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/WHAT%20DO%20AWARDS%20LOOK%20LIKE.png?width=421&height=421&name=WHAT%20DO%20AWARDS%20LOOK%20LIKE.png)**

‚≠êÔ∏è Contact our team to add this bag to your branded swag options this holiday season!

**Mission-Driven Brands We Love**

We work with a host of brands that have giving back built into their business. By incorporating products from these brands into your holiday gifts, you‚Äôre giving a high-quality item that aligns with eco-friendly and socially responsible initiatives. **![WHAT DO AWARDS LOOK LIKE \(1\)](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/WHAT%20DO%20AWARDS%20LOOK%20LIKE%20\(1\).png?width=232&height=689&name=WHAT%20DO%20AWARDS%20LOOK%20LIKE%20\(1\).png)**

**Tentree: **Tentree‚Äôs mission is as clear as their name; the company is committed to planting ten trees for every item purchased in an effort to regenerate ecosystems, capture carbon and provide planting jobs in communities around the world. Their products are also created with an "Earth-First" approach, meaning they‚Äôre made in fair, safe working conditions, and constructed using only sustainably sourced and recycled materials.

**MiiR: **MiiR keeps its mission closely connected to its product of high-quality drinkware by donating a portion of proceeds to fund clean water projects. In addition, the company has committed to achieve Net Zero emissions by 2030 and minimize the impact of materials, manufacturing, and distribution of their products.

**Corkcircle:** Corkcircle has partnered with charity: water to ensure that every purchase made on Corkcicle products brings clean water to those in need. With the mantra of "clean water changes everything," this company is on a mission to save lives, boost economies, and empower women through providing access to safe drinking water. 

**Storm Creek:** Storm Creek has sustainability ingrained in every layer of its organization, from the recycled bottles that become fibers of their high-quality apparel to their carbon-offset initiatives, this brand showcases how a major company can still put the planet first. In addition, the brand has a goal of donating $5 million to charity by 2030, and hit their first million in donations in 2022. 

Shelter to Soldier: Shelter to Soldier is a CA 501c3 nonprofit organization that adopts dogs from local shelters and trains them to become psychiatric service dogs for post-9/11 combat veterans to help both recover and move forward. A portion of all proceeds from the Work¬Æ/iCOOL¬Æ is donated to Shelter to Soldier.

Supporting brands with a mission amplifies the impact of your gifts, creating an opportunity for your company and recipients to connect with causes that align with their values.

‚≠êÔ∏è Want to know what other brands and products are available for mission-driven merch? [Learn more here!](/mission-driven-merch)

### **Creating Special Edition Merch to Fundraise for a Cause**

The holiday season is a great time to launch special edition merchandise, with proceeds dedicated to a cause close to your brand‚Äôs heart. Limited-edition items allow you to get creative with design while highlighting a purpose that resonates with your audience. We love [these examples](https://wwd.com/lists/companies-supporting-breast-cancer-awareness-month-1236644397/) of Breast Cancer Awareness supporting products, and we've seen some [truly creative ideas to support Pride](/blog/celebrate-pride-2024) each year.

If you're interested in creating special edition merchandise, you might consider products like [cozy fleece pullovers](/promotional-products/apparel) or [bags](/promotional-products/bags) that carry a message of hope or empowerment. For example, a limited-edition holiday sweater with a portion of sales going toward a nonprofit not only makes a memorable gift but also supports a meaningful mission. 

**Pro Tip:** If you create a special edition product to support the cause of your choice, make it clear about the intentions and impact of that product. People are more likely to support causes that come with a tangible outcome, so make sure to communicate the specific impact of each purchase‚Äîsuch as meals provided, funds raised for research, or resources allocated. This transparency adds value, helping your audience see how their support translates into real-world change.

### **![WHAT DO AWARDS LOOK LIKE \(2\)](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/WHAT%20DO%20AWARDS%20LOOK%20LIKE%20\(2\).png?width=423&height=423&name=WHAT%20DO%20AWARDS%20LOOK%20LIKE%20\(2\).png)**

### **Providing Branded Merch for Volunteering Events**

For companies organizing volunteer events, branded merch helps foster a sense of unity and provides a practical keepsake for the team and the organizations you support. 

**Team Unity Through Branded Apparel** : Outfit your volunteers with branded T-shirts, caps, or jackets to create a cohesive look during events. Branded apparel makes your team easily recognizable, promoting your brand‚Äôs involvement and demonstrating a united front for the cause.

This can also double as a fun way to experiment with design ‚Äî like these fundraiser T-Shirts that Stran created for a client! 

**Practical Products for the Partner Organization** : Gifting practical branded items‚Äîlike water bottles, hats, or tote bags‚Äîto the nonprofit and their clients or volunteers can extend your impact. These items not only serve as useful, everyday tools but also act as lasting reminders of your brand‚Äôs commitment to supporting their mission.

Merch for volunteer events can serve as a memorable touchpoint for everyone involved, strengthening your company‚Äôs bond with the community and reinforcing your dedication to making a difference.

### **Making a Lasting Impact With Purpose-Driven Merch**

As we enter a season that celebrates generosity, branded merchandise offers companies an effective, authentic way to engage with social causes. By choosing mission-driven products for corporate gifting, creating special edition merch with a purpose, and bringing branded items to volunteer events, you‚Äôre ensuring that every piece of merch contributes to a greater good. This holiday season, let your brand‚Äôs presence create lasting positive impact‚Äîone meaningful item at a time.

# Five Reasons to Host An Annual Open House

09.11.2024 | Events, Tradeshows, Swag, 2024, Open House, Why, Engagement

Our annual Open House is just a few weeks away, and we couldn't be more excited! For the past seven years, we‚Äôve gathered clients, vendors, and our team under one roof for our favorite event of the year.

It‚Äôs the perfect opportunity to explore the latest trends in merch, spend quality in-person time with our network, and most importantly, celebrate another successful year together.

Hosting this event has become a non-negotiable for us, and for good reason. Here are the Top 5 reasons we love hosting an open house for our network. 

## #1 - Strengthen Client Relationships 

At the heart of any successful business are strong relationships. Our Open House gives us a chance to connect face-to-face with our clients, vendors, and team, going beyond virtual meetings to build genuine connections. This in-person time allows us to not only catch up but also share industry insights, understand our clients' needs better, and brainstorm new ways to collaborate.

And of course, getting together with our network is _fun_! We‚Äôve cultivated incredible relationships over the past 30 years, and our Open House is the perfect opportunity to celebrate those bonds, talk shop, and enjoy the company of great people.

## #2 - Showcase New Products & Trends

Staying ahead of the latest trends in merch is our specialty, and our Open House is the ideal platform to showcase what's new. From innovative products to cutting-edge designs, this event lets us introduce our favorite finds to clients, vendors, and partners in a hands-on environment.

No matter how many emails we send or Zoom calls we host, nothing beats seeing and touching products in person. Our Open House lets everyone experience the quality and creativity of our offerings firsthand, making it easier to understand how we can elevate their brands through merch.

## #3 - Get Feedback & Foster Collaboration 

Communication is the key to any successful relationship, and our Open House creates the perfect space for open dialogue. Face-to-face interactions help us gather real-time feedback, brainstorm fresh ideas, and strengthen our collaborative efforts with clients and vendors alike. We‚Äôre deeply invested in the success of our partners, and this event is a way to show just how committed we are to making a positive impact in the industry. By listening to our network, we continue to evolve and innovate, keeping us at the forefront of the market.

## #4 - Walk Down Memory Lane 

This year, we‚Äôre celebrating our 30th anniversary with a ‚Äú1994‚Äù throwback theme. Expect ‚Äò90s-inspired cocktails, tunes, activities, and even attire! But beyond the nostalgia, our anniversary is a chance to reflect on how far we‚Äôve come as a company, the lessons we‚Äôve learned, and the relationships we‚Äôve built. We‚Äôve grown a lot since 1994, and we can‚Äôt wait to celebrate this milestone with the people who have been a part of our journey.

## #5 - Highlight the Road Ahead

Innovation has always been at the core of what we do, and our Open House is the perfect setting to showcase how we‚Äôre continuing to push boundaries in the merch world. We‚Äôll be offering product demos, showing off new branding techniques, and sharing insights from industry experts. Our "Women on the Rise" Cocktail Hour is another highlight of the event. This panel discussion, featuring five women leaders in the promotional products industry, will cover industry trends, best practices, and strategies for adapting to our ever-changing world (hello, AI!). It‚Äôs a great opportunity to network and gain valuable insights from some of the brightest minds in the business.

## _Bonus!_ #6 - Explore the Possibilities of Merch

Our Open House is designed to be an immersive experience, and we don‚Äôt hold back on that promise! With interactive activities, on-theme cocktails, and ‚Äò90s music setting the mood, we‚Äôll demonstrate exactly how merch can create memorable experiences. From innovative trending products to hands-on product customization and live demos, every year we strive to show our clients and vendors that we‚Äôre not just talking about the potential of branded products‚Äîwe‚Äôre living it. This event highlights the creativity and innovation we bring to our clients' merchandise programs and showcases the full range of possibilities that merch offers.

Check out this video from our 2023 Open House to get a peek at how we built an immersive experience for the event.

Centered Video

## Open House Events: A Win for Everyone

An open house is more than just a fun event‚Äîit‚Äôs a powerful tool to strengthen relationships, showcase your offerings, and position your company as a leader in the industry. From creating lasting impressions to fostering new partnerships, the benefits are clear. By inviting your network to experience your products and services firsthand, you elevate your brand and deepen the connections that matter most. If you're a merchandising company looking to grow, consider making an open house part of your strategy. It‚Äôs a win-win for your business and your network. 

_Didn‚Äôt get your invite?_

If you‚Äôd like to join us for this year‚Äôs open house, don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to your Stran sales rep. Or better yet, [contact us](/contact) directly so we can make sure you‚Äôre on the list!

And if you can‚Äôt attend but want to get all the updates on the event, make sure to follow us on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/stranpromotionalsolutions/), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/stranpromotionalsolutions/), [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/stranpromotionalsolutions), and [Twitter](https://x.com/stranpromosol).

# How to Build Brand Loyalty & Boost Sales with Tailgate Swag

08.23.2024 | Events, Custom Store, Swag, 2024, Beverage

Tailgating is more than just a pre-game ritual; it's a cultural phenomenon that unites fans, friends, and families around a shared passion for the game.

For businesses, this emotionally charged environment presents a unique opportunity to enhance brand visibility, drive sales, and foster lasting connections.

Tailgate-themed merchandise becomes the perfect vehicle to achieve these goals, creating memorable experiences that resonate long after the final whistle blows.

## Why Tailgate Swag? 

By offering branded merchandise that fans can use at tailgates, bars and restaurants, or watch parties, you can increase brand recognition and tap into the excitement of game day to drive behavior and encourage engagement. Whether it‚Äôs custom coolers, branded tents, or team-themed apparel, tailgate swag amplifies your brand‚Äôs presence and turns game day into a powerful brand activation tool.

Improve Brand Visibility and Awareness: Tailgate swag is a walking billboard for your brand. Whether it‚Äôs custom coolers, branded tents, or team-themed apparel, every piece of merchandise gets your logo in front of an engaged, enthusiastic audience. This increases brand visibility on game day and builds lasting brand recognition every time fans recall their game-watching experience. 

Boost Sales: The excitement of game day is contagious, and often translates into increased spending. By offering branded merchandise that fans can use at tailgates, bars, or watch parties, you create additional revenue streams and amplify your brand‚Äôs presence. Tailgate merch taps into the emotional connection fans have with the game, making them more likely to purchase and engage with your brand.

Drive Behavior: Tailgate-themed merchandise isn‚Äôt just about selling products; it‚Äôs about influencing behavior. Whether it‚Äôs encouraging social media sharing, driving traffic to your location, or fostering brand loyalty, the right merchandise can turn casual fans into brand advocates. By aligning your brand with the excitement of game day, you can inspire behaviors that go beyond purchasing.

Form Lasting Connections: In the world of marketing, creating meaningful connections with your audience is the ultimate goal. Tailgate swag offers a tangible way to build these connections by giving fans something they can use and enjoy. Whether it‚Äôs a branded grill at a parking lot tailgate or custom drinkware at a home watch party, these items serve as a reminder of both the game and your brand, fostering a deeper connection that lasts long after the season ends.

## How to Level Up Your Game Day Experience With Branded Swag

Transform Your Venue into a Game Day Destination[![2024 Tailgating_Landing Page Art-03 1](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/2024%20Tailgating_Landing%20Page%20Art-03%201.jpg?width=357&height=357&name=2024%20Tailgating_Landing%20Page%20Art-03%201.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724429973/#p=20)For bars and restaurants, game day is a prime opportunity to attract and engage sports fans. By incorporating tailgate-themed decor and merchandise, these venues can elevate the game day experience, turning casual visitors into loyal patrons. Branded [displays](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=23), decor, [uniforms](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=24), and [activities](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=27), create an atmosphere that resonates with sports enthusiasts, driving enthusiasm and encouraging them to spend more time‚Äîand money‚Äîat your establishment. Outfitting your bar or restaurant with custom wall clings, table tents, and branded drinkware not only enhances the overall ambiance but also makes your venue synonymous with game day excitement, ensuring fans return week after week. 

Bring the Game Day Spirit Home [![2024 Tailgating_Landing Page Art-04 1](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/2024%20Tailgating_Landing%20Page%20Art-04%201.jpg?width=384&height=384&name=2024%20Tailgating_Landing%20Page%20Art-04%201.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724429973/#p=30)

Game day isn‚Äôt confined to the stadium or sports bars‚Äîwatch parties, corporate events, and community gatherings are all part of the experience. Tailgate-themed merchandise plays a crucial role in bringing the excitement of football season to any location, fostering camaraderie and creating lasting connections among attendees. Whether it‚Äôs a small gathering of friends or a large corporate event, branded cookware, [appliances](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=33), decor, [serveware](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=34), drinkware, and [games](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=40) can transform any space into a lively, football-focused environment. These items not only enhance the event but also leave attendees with a tangible reminder of the fun and camaraderie they shared, deepening their connection to your brand.

Take Tailgating to the Next Level[![2024 Tailgating_Landing Page Art-02 1](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/2024%20Tailgating_Landing%20Page%20Art-02%201.jpg?width=397&height=397&name=2024%20Tailgating_Landing%20Page%20Art-02%201.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724429973/#p=4)Organizations, universities, and sponsors hosting tailgates have the chance to create an unforgettable experience that embodies team spirit and camaraderie. Tailgate-themed merchandise is essential for boosting brand visibility in these high-energy environments. By decking out your tailgate with [branded coolers](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=6), tents, tables, chairs, [grills](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=10), and [speakers](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=15), you create an immersive experience that fans will associate with your brand. These items aren‚Äôt just functional‚Äîthey‚Äôre conversation starters that keep your brand top-of-mind throughout the event, ensuring that your presence is felt long after the game has ended.

Celebrate Your Team's Success [![2024 Tailgating_Landing Page Art-05 1](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/2024%20Tailgating_Landing%20Page%20Art-05%201.jpg?width=401&height=401&name=2024%20Tailgating_Landing%20Page%20Art-05%201.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724429973/#p=42)

Game day victories are more than just a win on the field‚Äîthey‚Äôre an opportunity to celebrate success with your corporate network, employees, and clients. Tailgate-themed merchandise can enhance these celebrations, turning shared moments of joy into lasting brand connections. [Branded accessories](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=45), [apparel](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=46), and drinkware add to the festive atmosphere, creating a sense of unity and shared success that strengthens relationships with both clients and employees. Equipping your team with [custom gear for post-game celebrations](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=45) not only serves as a memento of the victory but also reinforces your brand‚Äôs presence in a positive, celebratory context.

Make Your Brand a Game Day Essential [![2024 Tailgating_Landing Page Art-06 1](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/2024%20Tailgating_Landing%20Page%20Art-06%201.jpg?width=387&height=387&name=2024%20Tailgating_Landing%20Page%20Art-06%201.jpg)](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724429973/#p=56)Tailgate-themed activations offer a powerful way to integrate your brand into the game day experience, making it an essential part of the event. For bars, restaurants, liquor stores, and business collaborations, [branded wall and floor clings](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=58), decor, [product displays](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=60), and other [promotional items](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/xgwx/?1724265402/#p=62) create an immersive environment that drives behavior and encourages engagement. By partnering with local businesses to offer exclusive promotions or setting up branded displays, you can draw attention and encourage interaction, turning your brand into a must-have on game day. Tailgate swag ensures that fans engage with your brand at every turn, making your presence felt throughout the game day experience. 

## Tap Into Tailgate Excitement With Custom Merch 

Tailgate-themed merchandise is more than just a marketing tool; it‚Äôs a way to create memorable experiences that connect your brand with fans on a deeper level. By leveraging the excitement of game day, you can increase brand visibility, drive sales, and build lasting relationships with your audience. Whether you‚Äôre outfitting a bar, hosting a watch party, or sponsoring a tailgate, the right merchandise can turn any event into a brand-building opportunity. So, gear up, get in the game, and let your tailgate swag lead the way! 

Want more tailgate merch inspiration? Check out our [2024 Tailgating Playbook](/tailgating-playbook) and [s](https://share.hsforms.com/1bw1iPC-RQFmAI4s_Fu8-7g30kxd?__hstc=104330591.4d502667679f4f96b30999fd981163b6.1717420243850.1718050301980.1718054612321.29&__hssc=104330591.7.1718054612321&__hsfp=3523199817)[ubscribe to our blog](https://share.hsforms.com/1bw1iPC-RQFmAI4s_Fu8-7g30kxd?__hstc=104330591.4d502667679f4f96b30999fd981163b6.1717420243850.1718050301980.1718054612321.29&__hssc=104330591.7.1718054612321&__hsfp=3523199817) for all the latest trends in promotional products.

# Summer Team Building Ideas to Boost Employee Engagement

06.24.2024 | Events, Summer, Swag, 2024, Engagement

![Untitled-2_8e53887c-7e88-4247-82ba-023fc65895da](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Untitled-2_8e53887c-7e88-4247-82ba-023fc65895da.webp?width=1040&height=609&name=Untitled-2_8e53887c-7e88-4247-82ba-023fc65895da.webp)

Summer is here, and there‚Äôs no better time to get out of the office and do some team-building activities! Team building is important all year long, but summer offers the added opportunity to take advantage of the weather and shake things up. Team building isn‚Äôt just about taking a break from daily duties; it‚Äôs a simple, effective way to build connections and foster collaboration on your team. Check out our recommendations for team-building activity ideas below! 

# Why Team Building Is Important 

What makes team building so important? No matter what industry your business is in, you need to rely on your team to work together towards a common goal. That‚Äôs where team building comes in! Regular team building activities have been shown to enhance employee engagement and improve collaborative efforts. 

Summertime team building is especially helpful to keep folks connected despite summer travel and shifting routines! As many employees take time off in the summer or move to hybrid and remote schedules, planning a team-building activity can be a great way to make sure everyone on the team feels included, in the know, and connected to the overall mission and direction of the company. 

But team building isn‚Äôt just about better business results; it‚Äôs also proven to boost morale and trust among a team. These added benefits can improve employee retention and strengthen positive company culture. When employees are connected, engaged, and feeling positive about their work life, everyone wins. 

# Four Types of Team Building Activities 

There are endless examples of team building activities, and if you‚Äôre looking to create your own it can be helpful to organize them by ‚Äútype.‚Äù

Each type of activity has a specific goal:

**1. Communications Focused**

2. Problem Solving

3. Planning

4. Trust Building 

_Want to see these a ctivity types in action? Read on for examples!  _

## Communication Activities 

Communication activities often involve active listening, critical thinking, varied communication techniques, and giving or receiving feedback. This is a great type of exercise for teams of any size, because everyone can benefit from improved communication. Plus, you might learn something about your team members in the process! 

###### **Summer Team Building Activity: Outdoor Scavenger Hunt**

Most scavenger hunts involve three elements: items, clues, and prizes. Items are placed in strategic locations, and each clue offers a hint (sometimes even a brainteaser or riddle) to find the next item. Prizes are earned by solving the scavenger hunt quickly or with creative solutions.

Scavenger hunts make great team-building exercises because teams must work together to find the items, solve the clues, and move forward through the challenge. They also offer an opportunity for friendly competition and connectivity, especially for larger companies with multiple departments. 

Rather than having teams organized by specialty (e.g. Finance team, Marketing team, Ops team), try setting teams with folks who wouldn‚Äôt normally connect in their day-to-day workflow. This allows for more diverse perspectives and helps individuals get to know each other better, setting everyone up for more collaboration in the future. 

When the scavenger hunt is set and the teams are organized, let the games begin! 

###### **Scavenger Hunt Swag**

[**Solo Stove S'mores Bowl**](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/jjyl/?1718128139/#p=63)

Perfect for summer adventures, this portable tabletop s‚Äômores roaster brings flickering flames and crackling campfire sounds with clean-burning, smoke-free gel fuel. Easy to use on the kitchen counter, dessert table, or anywhere you want to make lasting summer memories, the Solo Stove S‚Äômores Bowl is a great prize for scavenger hunt champions. 

[**![Smores-by-Terraflame-PDP-Imagery-4](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Smores-by-Terraflame-PDP-Imagery-4.jpg?width=431&height=431&name=Smores-by-Terraflame-PDP-Imagery-4.jpg)**](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/jjyl/?1718128139/#p=63)

[Yeti 42oz. Rambler ](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/pywj/#p=8)

Don't forget to hydrate at your team-building event! The Yeti Rambler is a favorite swag item for all seasons. Durable and with a large capacity for cold and hot beverages, this insulated tumbler ensures your team members will be sipping in style. 

# [**![Screenshot 2024-06-11 111154](https://www.stran.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-06-11%20111154.png?width=465&height=404&name=Screenshot%202024-06-11%20111154.png)**](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/pywj/#p=8)

##  Problem-Solving Activities

Problem-solving exercises offer teams a low-stakes opportunity to practice working together towards a common goal. Our favorite problem-solving activity is an Escape Room, because it tasks a group with getting organized, communicating, and figuring out a solution that works for all. 

###### **Summer Team Building Activity: Escape Room Challenge**

Escape Room Challenges are a top choice for group problem solving activities. From family reunions to corporate retreats, it‚Äôs clear that booking an Escape Room is a great way to get folks working together, and the thrill of racing the clock brings another level of fun to the activity. Want to make the most of Escape Room activities?

##  Planning activities

Planning activities offer an opportunity for teams to collaborate, get creative, and exercise adaptability in the moment. No matter what kind of work you do, everyone can benefit from coordination and adjusting on the fly. Planning activities can also overlap with other types of team-building exercises. For example, if your company plans a field-day, there are multiple activities, games, and initiatives that could happen on that day. 

###### Summer Team Building Activity: Field Day on the Beach

Summer and the outdoors go hand in hand, don't they? Companies can take advantage of summer weather and foster collaboration by coordinating [games](https://online.fliphtml5.com/cbxii/pywj/#p=41), exercises, and initiatives at a beach or local park. Getting folks out of the office and into nature can also serve as a mental reset for teams, helping them bring a fresh perspective back to the office when it‚Äôs time to get back to work.

For a summer field day, try incorporating a few different types of activities from this list. An outdoor scavenger hunt, a sandcastle-building competition, relay races, and beach volleyball are all fun group activities to get folks engaged, communicating, and using their problem-solving skills in a fun and low-stakes environment. 

It‚Äôs a great practice to offer prizes and incentives for every activity, and if you really want to get creative, set up an activity bracket or tournament. Throughout the day teams can advance or fall out of the running for a grand prize, and the whole staff can get in on cheering for their colleagues.

## trust building activities

You might not think that trust and business mix, but for your team trust is essential. When team members trust one another, they‚Äôre more likely to brainstorm openly, offer honest opinions, try new ideas, and support each other. Trust is necessary to get the most out of your team, and any activity that challenges teammates to lean on each other is a good option.

The classic examples of trust-falls and blindfolded activities work great, but also consider collaboration games like a 3-legged race or a cooking competition. Another option is to invest in immersive offerings like a retreat to help people feel comfortable and more open to connection. 

###### Summer Team Building Activity: Team Recipe Challenge

What better way to engage employees than by uniting over food? In this easy-to-facilitate team-building activity, break your team up into groups of three and offer the task of creating a recipe from scratch. Have one person write a recipe, another provide verbal instructions, and the third person to cook the food.

This activity encourages good communication and trust among colleagues, and often brings lots of laughs. Teams will quickly realize that being clear and straightforward with communication is essential and that listening to one another is key to finding success. 

Make this activity more engaging with simple details like custom aprons and chef hats and offer prizes for the teams who generate the most creative and tastiest recipes.
